description: Users may experience unexpected audio playback issues while using Microsoft Edge (Chromium-based) version 119.0.2151.58, especially during the use of WebAudio API. This could manifest as intermittent audio dropouts or glitches, impacting the overall browsing experience. The related security update addresses a use-after-free vulnerability associated with audio components, as noted in KB-119.0.2151.58, released on November 9, 2023.
